#!/bin/bash

menu=("speedtest-cli| apt install    "
"kdeconnect| apt install    "
"zsh| apt install    "
"ufw| apt install    "
"guake| apt install    "
"tmux| apt install    "
"yad| apt install    "
"zulucrypt-cli| apt install    "
"zulucrypt-gui| apt install    "
"zulusafe-cli| apt install    "
"libzulucryptpluginmanager1.0.0| apt install    "
"libzulucrypt-plugins| apt install    "
"nodau | apt install    "
"pwman3 | apt install    "
"bwn-ng | apt install    "
"calcurse| apt install    "
"vnstat | apt install    "
"viper-browser | apt install    "
"vlc | apt install    "
"firefox-esr | apt install    "
"viper-browser | apt install    "
"mpv | apt install    "
"vimoucompleteme| apt install    "
"speedtest-cli | apt install    "
"obsidian-2-gtk-theme | apt install    "
"obsidian-icon-theme | apt install    "
"falkon | apt install    "
"kodi kodi-repository-kodi | apt install    "
)

yad_opts=( 
	--title="RD2" 
	--text="Install the rest of available software from aptitude" 
	--form 
	--button="Install" --button="Be a Pussy" 
	--image="logo.png"
)


for m in "${menu[@]}"
do
  yad_opts+=( --field="${m%|*}:CHK" )
done

IFS='|' read -ra ans < <( yad "${yad_opts[@]}" )

for i in "${!ans[@]}"
do
  if [[ ${ans[$i]} == TRUE ]]
  then
    m=${menu[$i]}
    name=${m%|*}
    cmd=${m#*|}
    echo "selected: $name ($cmd)"
    $cmd


  fi
done
